remarks: Every set is well-founded, assuming the Axiom of Regularity. Proposition 9.13 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 78.  This variant of ~ tz9.13g is useful in proofs of theorems about the rank function.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Oct-2003.)
statement:
rankwflem $p |- ( A e. V -> E. x e. On A e. ( R1 ` suc x ) ) $.
$d A x $.
